org.dcm4che3.tool.dcm2xml

Class Dcm2Xml

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dcm4che3.tool.dcm2xml.Dcm2Xml

  • public class Dcm2Xml
extends Object
    Tool for converting DICOM to XML presentation and optionally apply XSLT stylesheet on it.
    Author:
    Gunter Zeilinger
